oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Airways flight to California, circa 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified passengers aboard a Capitol Airways flight, circa 1960s. Several persons on that trip were wearing buttons that read: “Litton Rand Official.” Capitol Airways was founded in 1946 and ended operations in 1982. The airline was also known as Capitol International Airways. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 35 mm slide, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Capitol International Airways--History--Sources
